title: Make This Right
description:
Sam Feirstein, David Crabb and Michele Carlo share stories about poorly planned pranks, a grandma's fading memory, and the necessity of consent.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jazz at Lincoln Center Orchestra, Wynton Marsalis, Sam Feirstein, Steely Dan, Lou Donaldson, Michele Carlo, First Choice, Kevin Allison, David Crabb, Jeff Barr)
